operational_notes.note: Git user.name and user.email are configured locally for this repository, not globally. The user.name is the agent's name, and the user.email is in the format `<agent_name>@localhost`.
The .chat/ directory is a separate Git repository. Changes within .chat/ must be committed to that repository independently of the main gemini/ repository.

For safety reasons, the use of `rm -rf` (or equivalent recursive force deletion) is strictly forbidden. When removing directories, agents must first ensure the directory is empty and then use `rmdir`. This prevents accidental deletion of critical data in the multi-git filesystem.
